medaka.string_process:
process medaka {
    tag "Consensus polishing for ${reads.simpleName}"
    label "process_medium"
    publishDir "$params.outdir"+"/assembly", mode: "copy"

    input:
        tuple val(sample_id), path(assembly), path(reads)
    output:
        tuple val(sample_id), file("${reads.simpleName}.fasta")
    shell:
        """
        medaka_consensus -i ${reads} -d ${assembly} -o . -t ${task.cpus}
        mv consensus.fasta ${reads.simpleName}.fasta
        """
}

medaka_gpu.string_process:
process medaka_gpu {
    tag "Consensus polishing for ${reads.simpleName}"
    label "process_medium"
    publishDir "$params.outdir"+"/assembly", mode: "copy"

    input:
        tuple val(sample_id), path(assembly), path(reads)
    output:
        tuple val(sample_id), file("${reads.simpleName}.fasta")
    shell:
        """
        medaka_consensus -i ${reads} -d ${assembly} -o . -t ${task.cpus}
        mv consensus.fasta ${reads.simpleName}.fasta
        """
}

combine.string_process:
process combine {
    tag "Combining Fastq files for ${sample_id}"
    label "process_low"
    cache false

    input:
        tuple val(sample_id), path(reads)
    output:
        tuple val(sample_id), file("${sample_id}.{fastq,fastq.gz}")
    shell:
        """
        sample=\$(ls ${reads} | head -n 1)
        if [[ \${sample##*.} == "gz" ]]; then
            cat ${reads}/*.fastq.gz > ${sample_id}.fastq.gz
        else
            cat ${reads}/*.fastq > ${sample_id}.fastq
        fi
        """
}
combine.string_script:
"""
        sample=\$(ls ${reads} | head -n 1)
        if [[ \${sample##*.} == "gz" ]]; then
            cat ${reads}/*.fastq.gz > ${sample_id}.fastq.gz
        else
            cat ${reads}/*.fastq > ${sample_id}.fastq
        fi
        """

porechop.string_process:
process porechop {
    tag "Adapter trimming on ${reads.simpleName}"
    label "process_high"
    cache true

    input:
        tuple val(sample_id), path(reads)
    output:
        tuple val(sample_id), file("${reads.simpleName}.trimmed.fastq")
    shell:
        """
        porechop -t ${task.cpus} -i ${reads} -o ${reads.simpleName}.trimmed.fastq
        """
}

nanoq.string_process:
process nanoq {
    tag "Read filtering on ${reads.simpleName}"
    label "process_low"
    cache true

    input:
        tuple val(sample_id), path(reads)
    output:
        tuple val(sample_id), file("${reads.simpleName}.filt.fastq.gz")
    shell:
        """
        nanoq -i ${reads} -l 300 -q 5 -O g > ${reads.simpleName}.filt.fastq.gz
        """
}

nanofilt.string_process:
process nanofilt {
    tag "Read filtering on ${reads.simpleName}"
    label "process_low"
    cache true

    input:
        tuple val(sample_id), path(reads)
    output:
        tuple val(sample_id), file("${reads.simpleName}.filt.fastq.gz")
    shell:
        """
        sample=\$(ls ${reads} | head -n 1)
        if [[ \${sample##*.} == "gz" ]]; then
            zcat ${reads} | NanoFilt -q 10 | gzip > ${reads.simpleName}.filt.fastq.gz
        else
            cat ${reads} | NanoFilt -q 10 | gzip > ${reads.simpleName}.filt.fastq.gz
        fi
        """
}
nanofilt.string_script:
"""
        sample=\$(ls ${reads} | head -n 1)
        if [[ \${sample##*.} == "gz" ]]; then
            zcat ${reads} | NanoFilt -q 10 | gzip > ${reads.simpleName}.filt.fastq.gz
        else
            cat ${reads} | NanoFilt -q 10 | gzip > ${reads.simpleName}.filt.fastq.gz
        fi
        """

minimap2.string_process:
process minimap2 {
    tag "Minimap2 alignment on ${reads.simpleName}"
    label "process_medium"

    input:
        tuple val(sample_id), path(reads)
        path(reference)
    output:
        tuple val(sample_id), file("${reads.simpleName}.bam")
    shell:
        """
        minimap2 -ax map-ont -t ${task.cpus} ${reference} ${reads} | samtools view -bS -@ ${task.cpus} - | samtools sort - > ${reads.simpleName}.bam
        """
}
minimap2.string_script:
"""
        minimap2 -ax map-ont -t ${task.cpus} ${reference} ${reads} | samtools view -bS -@ ${task.cpus} - | samtools sort - > ${reads.simpleName}.bam
        """

tools_dico.name: Minimap2
tools_dico.description: Pairwise aligner for genomic and spliced nucleotide sequences

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

ivar_trim.string_process:
process ivar_trim {
    tag "Primer trimming on ${bam.simpleName}"
    label "process_medium"

    input:
        tuple val(sample_id), path(bam)
        path(bed)
    output:
        tuple val(sample_id), file("${bam.simpleName}.trimmed.bam")
    shell:
        """
        ivar trim -b ${bed} -p ${bam.simpleName}.trimmed -i ${bam} -q 0
        """
}

tools_dico.name: AIVAR
tools_dico.description: Assessing concordance among human, in silico predictions and functional assays on genetic variant classification.

ivar_consensus.string_process:
process ivar_consensus {
    tag "Consensus calling on ${bam.simpleName}"
    label "process_medium"

    input:
        tuple val(sample_id), path(bam)
    output:
        tuple val(sample_id), file("${bam.simpleName}.fa")
    shell:
        """
        samtools sort ${bam} | samtools mpileup -d 1000 -A -Q 0 - | ivar consensus -p ${bam.simpleName} -q 10
        """
}
ivar_consensus.string_script:
"""
        samtools sort ${bam} | samtools mpileup -d 1000 -A -Q 0 - | ivar consensus -p ${bam.simpleName} -q 10
        """

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

tools_dico.name: AIVAR
tools_dico.description: Assessing concordance among human, in silico predictions and functional assays on genetic variant classification.

bam2fq.string_process:
process bam2fq {
    tag "bam2fq on ${bam.simpleName}"
    label "process_low"

    input:
        tuple val(sample_id), path(bam)
    output:
        tuple val(sample_id), file("${bam.simpleName}.trimmed.fastq")
    shell:
        """
        samtools fastq -@ ${task.cpus} ${bam} > ${bam.simpleName}.trimmed.fastq
        """
}

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

clipbam.string_process:
process clipbam {
    tag "Bam clipping on ${bam.simpleName}"
    label "process_low"

    input:
        tuple val(sample_id), path(bam)
    output:
        tuple val(sample_id), file("${bam.simpleName}.clipped.bam")
    shell:
        """
        bamutils removeclipping ${bam} ${bam.simpleName}.clipped.bam
        """
}

ampliconclip.string_process:
process ampliconclip {
    tag "Primer trimming on ${bam.simpleName}"
    label "process_low"

    input:
        tuple val(sample_id), path(bam)
        path(bed)
    output:
        tuple val(sample_id), file("${bam.simpleName}.trimmed.bam")
    shell:
        """
        samtools ampliconclip --no-excluded -@ ${task.cpus} --hard-clip --both-ends --filter-len 0 -b ${bed} ${bam} > ${bam.simpleName}.trimmed.bam
        """
}

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.
